turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. How's it going?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's going well, how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm great.I would like to check I would like to order some pizza from the new pizzeria Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to go over some of the new types of pizzas. Do they have a California style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, fantastic. I'd like to order one large California-style pizza on gluten-free crust and then I need to choose two different types of pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a St Louis-style pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Maybe, what is a st Louis-style pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Better yet, do they have a Greek-style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. I'll take a Greek-style pizza as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then a cheese pizza. So, that would be three large pizzas on gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One California style pizza, one Greek style pizza, and one cheese pizza on gluten free crust all three of them on gluten free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 large pizzas, one large California style, one Greek style and one cheese all on gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like all of the pizzas on gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's what I said.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, fantastic. How much will that cost?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And okay those are large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there's a buy one get one deal on style pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fantastic. Thank you so much. I'd like to I would like to pick those up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, they'll be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You as well.
